channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Vicarage Close, Shurdington, 27th March
item.description:
At the far left hand end of Vicarage Close which lorries seem toturn in

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Vicarage Close, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 27th March
item.description:
5 inches deep in the carriageway is causing issues when entering and exiting their home. Due to this the customer is not able to leave their home.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 27th March
item.description:
Customer reported the drains on 24th October 2024. Customer has had a specialist come out today due to toilets not flushing. Specialist has stated that the drainage has collapsed and the carriageway is going to need digging up for drainage to be fixed/replaced. Customer is asking for contact with AHR.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire road is full of potholes which damage cars which have to drive down here as they live here. Itâ€™s unacceptable, 27th March
item.description:
The entire length of Hanover Street is covered in large potholes and loose road. It is damaging cars which the owner then has to pay to rectify. This has been the case for at least the last year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Hanover Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
